modules.description: Provides functions to parse XML data into a structured list format, extract specific elements by tag name, and serialize structured data back into XML. Works with XML documents represented as nested lists and strings. Used to generate and modify playlist files in a custom XML format for media applications.

Parses XML playlist data to extract track metadata and URIs, handling formats like podcast (RSS), XSPF, and SMIL/ASX, with automatic format detection. It returns a list of tuples containing track metadata and URI, standardizing the artist field across different formats. The module includes error conversion to strings for debugging and supports explicit format specification when needed.
